version_description:
- Added gold ratings tab
- Removed trading
- 14 days free premium

In the new app release you can find rating page enhancements, see the date, and the analyst name on the top. We also change the default setting of our notification to be off. you may adapt your notification in the profile page.

New algorithm, a new look.
We're rebranding our mobile app with a new name and image to better show our unique value and better align with our uses focus.
Our new application features an updated decision-engine that will take into account users votes. This would be a great add-on to the existing analyst data and which adds another important layer of data dimension.
Updated user-votes count, connectivity detection and bug-fixes.

Check out our new and exciting additions:
• Top votes by all users
• News filtering by industry
• Get notification for Gold and watchlist or by customized filter
• Bug fixes – Keep on the good work and contact us with any question
Coming soon: Selected Investment Portfolio’s

• Investment portfolio - will be created monthly based on User-Votes (tap into the wisdom of the crowds) - followup to see portfolio vs. market results.
•. News channel update: Enjoy Ads-free news for both subscribers and free users

Now available:
- Now you can Get Credits to open Gold Rating and enjoy the best analyst recommendation as well as top user votes.
- Portfolio improvement and industry pie chart.
- Bug fixes
